title: She's All Mine
description: Eons ago, a war between good and evil was fought over Earth and its people. The Original Alpha banished his Beta, the dark one, to middle earth along with his army of minions. An impenetrable shield was then erected over the entrance in order to keep him locked away forever, or so they thought. The growing corruption of mankind has caused the shield to crack, and the need for the powerful white wolves has returned. Follow the journey of 5 couples. As they discover trust, love, loss and faith. Since, it is their united front which will restore balance on Earth.Broke up into separate novellas following each couple. This is Serenity and Loganâ€™s story.
author: Elena  Moreno
